name: Briggs & Stratton 10 Kw 100 Amp Single Phase 120/240 V Standby Generator with Automatic Transfer Switch in Steel Enclosure

reviews.name: Briggs & Stratton 10 Kw 100 Amp Single Phase 120/240 V Standby Generator with Automatic Transfer Switch in Steel Enclosure
reviews.reviewText: i bought this over holidays very excited to have power for my home during power outages
reviews.title: like the auto yransfer switch powers up whole hous

reviews.name: Briggs & Stratton 10 Kw 100 Amp Single Phase 120/240 V Standby Generator with Automatic Transfer Switch in Steel Enclosure
reviews.reviewText: this generator has a weekly self-check feature that makes it easy to see any problems - of which we have not seen in the 2 years of owning it. it is ALWAYS ready to turn itself on and it has several times over the last 2 years.
reviews.title: ALWAYS READY!

reviews.name: Briggs & Stratton 10 Kw 100 Amp Single Phase 120/240 V Standby Generator with Automatic Transfer Switch in Steel Enclosure
reviews.reviewText: I installed 10kw whole house generator just before the early snow storm of 2009' , power was out for 5 days but I had every thing up and running (ran for 5 days with not so much as a hiccup) could not be happier with it.
reviews.title: 07 March 2014
